properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 1:16PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Etowah River near East Canton Downstream I-575 affecting Cherokee
County


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Etowah River near East Canton Downstream I-575.
* From this afternoon until further notice.
* At 12 PM Thursday the stage was 16.8 feet...and rising.
* Flood stage is 17 feet.
* At 17 feet...Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the
woodlands and fields along the river generally east of Canton. This
includes the grassy lot behind a pump station off Riverstone
Parkway and near the Interstate 575 bridge.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
